com.navis.framework.persistence

Class HSQLDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.persistence.DatabaseHelper
      • com.navis.framework.persistence.HSQLDatabaseHelper

  • public class HSQLDatabaseHelper
extends DatabaseHelper
    This class is a placeholder, since we currently do not support HQL In case if we need it, each method has to be implemented or/and testsed

    * @author Andrey Ignatenko, 8/20/2014

      • modifyBinaryToBlob

        public void modifyBinaryToBlob(@NotNull
                               java.lang.String inTableName,
                               @NotNull
                               java.lang.String inColumnName)
        Description copied from class: DatabaseHelper
        Prerequisites for Oracle: 1. Modified long raw shouldn't have constraints (except NULL or NOT NULL).
        2. No Domain index on this column
        3. No PLSQL procedures call this table
        4. Undo space should be sufficient to keep altered table
        Specified by:
        modifyBinaryToBlob in class DatabaseHelper
        Parameters:
        inTableName - table name with BLOB
        inColumnName - BLOB type column
